attributes.action: Protect Brexit stop Starmer taking us back into the EU
attributes.additional_details: We were given a one time vote is what David Cameron said. A referendum that would be withheld no matter what the outcome. Ever since nearly every MP as done everything they can to reverse this because it didn’t go their way. Starmer ask many times for another referendum with the backing of the labour and some Tory and Lib Dem’s. Now he’s saying he will not rule out rejoining the EU. This country is doing far better than when in the EU even though they will have you believe the opposite
attributes.background: Respect the referendum vote of 17.4 million. Starmer is talking about taking us back into the EU we voted leave and won the majority vote. One man can not be allowed to reverse this vote on his own. Stop this reversal or better don’t even allow the consideration of this reversal.

rejection.details: The Government have not released plans to re-join the EU.
